duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for loading, unloading & staging items delivered to and shipped from the facility.
Assist with receiving/inventory processes as directed and maintain warehouse cleanliness throughout the shift.
Operate forklift and other heavy equipment to load/unload trucks.
Stage newly received items in quarantine area to be quality checked.
Assist Shipping & Receiving Coordinator with verifying, documenting, and tagging received items.
Assist Shipping & Receiving Inventory Coordinator with moving items from quarantine area to inventory & job kitting locations.
Remove pallets, boxes, and trash from the warehouse daily.
Promote safety awareness and complies with all applicable safety procedures and regulations.
Maintain current knowledge of safety standards.
Be familiar with Company HSE policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED and at least 2 years of work experience in a manufacturing environment.
